it.polimi.se2018.model

Class Bag

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.model.Bag

  • public class Bag
extends java.lang.Object
    Bag Class This class is used to create the bag containing all Die that will be used during the match
    Author:
    Federico Lichinchi

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Bag()
      Die Bag Bag Class Constructor Initially, the bag has 3 groups of Die for each color of the game

      Random Mixer This method mixes the game Die in the bag

      Die Extractor Method that casually extracts a die from the bag

      Die Getter This method returns a Die from the Die array of the Bag, given the column and the row of the matrix

      Die Value Getter This method returns the number of game Die in the bag

        Die Extractor Method that casually extracts a die from the bag
        Returns:

      • getDie

        public Die getDie(int line,
                  int column)
        Die Getter This method returns a Die from the Die array of the Bag, given the column and the row of the matrix
        Parameters:
        line - Line number of Bag game Die array
        column - Column number of Bag game Die array
        Returns:
        Die the chosen die

      • reInsertDie

        public void reInsertDie(Die die)
        Parameters:
        die - the die to be added grid
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if it is not possible to insert a die in the Die bag because the bag is already full of Die
